name: Evolution (itch) (fedz)
description:
Evolution is a submission to the Nokia Game Jam 2, you play as a creature that can evolve on death, provided you found evolution points before you died. Evolve to the ultimate form by collecting 5 evolution points to win the game

Controls:

AD = left and right / Spacebar = attack mode / S = Glide mode / W = jump

Music and SFX by https://itch.io/profile/rismosch
